mapper.sql: id, create_time, update_time, is_deleted, manager_id, ip, address
mapper.select: select bsll.*, am.nick_name nickName from base_system_log_login bsll left join auth_manager am on am.id = bsll.manager_id where 1=1 and am.nick_name like concat('%',#{keyword},'%') order by bsll.create_time desc

select bslo.*, am.nick_name nickName from base_system_log_operation bslo left join auth_manager am on am.id = bslo.manager_id where 1=1
and ( am.nick_name like concat('%',#{keyword},'%') or bslo.title like concat('%',#{keyword},'%') or bslo.subject like concat('%',#{keyword},'%') )
order by bslo.create_time desc
